name: One Week
description:
Play as an average middle schooler in a not so average school. Uncover the secrets that lie underneath the campus, and about your own past.

ALSO, uhh I didn't know if I should upload the PC version or the web version, so I uploaded both. Just try both and see how it goes from there. Idk. Figure it out.

If the PC version doesn't work, try the Windows version.  The software is kinda edgy.
